pizzas.name: Margarita
pizzas.description: A light pizza with olive oil, garlic, fresh basil, fresh tomatoes, mozzarella and Parmesan cheeses. Perfect with a beer on a hot summer night.

pizzas.name: Vegetariana
pizzas.description: Specially made for hipster vegan parties.

pizzas.name: Capricciosa
pizzas.description: Mozzarella cheese, Italian baked ham, mushroom, artichoke and tomato.

pizzas.name: Napoletana
pizzas.description: Made with fresh tomatoes and classic Italian Mozzarella cheese.
